solution.text:
Let the number Ram is thinking of be \(x\).
Therefore,
\(_{j}_x+_{k}_=_{{j+1}}_x-_{{l-k}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{j+1}}_x-_{j}_x=_{k}_+_{{l-k}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow x=_{l}_\)
The number Ram is thinking of is \(_{l}_\)

content.text: Ram is thinking of a number. If it is multiplied by \(_{j}_\) and then added with \(_{k}_\), the result is \(_{{l-k}}_\) less than \(_{{j+1}}_\) times the number. What number is ram thinking of?
